Articles.Content:
it started today i had problems it would freeze in loading and say not responding

 

my ksp logs:https://drive.google.com/file/d/1GspXMnomG51Zh5YpqQCU8iEc8KbIwyXb/view?usp=drive_link
I tried to open the log file, but I'm getting an access error.  Can you check permissions on the file?
i fixed it it was 2 mods i installed.... thanks
So...which mods?? I'm having this problem, too! Help us out here with some info.

I had the same problem and I fixed it. After installing Parallax loading stuck in black screen with orbiting planets. I reinstalled all mods one by one and find that problem is mod names "DART Project" whitch was been in conflict with Parallax (in CKAN it was OK...) . Without this mod it works properly.
